ygData.subject: Re: End of Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: True but the problem is stuff like this is still going to happen so there is need to punish other people who kite properly. The majority of the people kite
ygData.messageBody:
True but the problem is stuff like this is still going to happen so there is
need to punish other people who kite properly. The majority of the people
kite properly and that's the thing. Very few people ,at least on my server,
don't kite properly, and those that do it wrong are usually the ones that
train people for the fun of it.

Naeamin Wood Elf Bard
Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer
-----Original Message-----
From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, August 26, 1999 1:25 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] End of Kiting?


>From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
>On Thu, 26 Aug 1999, Naeeldar wrote:
>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> accident and was running away from it. The reason I say that is because
as
>> soon as I peg one giant with just one of my Necro's dots he is on me
until
>> somebody else outdamages me. I hunt SG's in Oasis quite a bit so I've
>> watched this for quite awhile. Hell with my druid friend when we hit 30
we
>
>I imagine from your post that you are a responsible kiter. Have you ever
>kited a SG up and down the coast in Oasis? If not then you are probably
>doing things right. I myself have died to irresponsible kiters numerous
>times. What occurs is the fact that the kiter with JBoots or SOW starts
>to outrun the MOB. The mob still continues to chase you but it will mob
>anything near it. Trust me I know, I have died to it while looting a dead
>mob, looting my corpse, while a druid ran by me and even while medding in
>the desert. Now was this druid kiting? Of course she was because she was
>having a discussion with some other druids and necros about kiting the
>giants in Oasis. Let me say that kiting is not bad when done properly,
>when done wrong it it is downright detestable and those people should
>suffer.
>
>Treilanin Loreweaver
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>ONElist: your connection to like-minds and kindred spirits.
>
